titleStmt.title: The first part of the widdow of Watling street & her three daughters, & how her wicked .[sic]son accused her to be an harlot, and his sisters bastards. To the tune of Bragandary.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and date from STC.
Verse: "Of the kinde Widdow of Watling street".
In two parts; the second part has title: The second part of the Widdow of Watling street and her three daughters to the tune of, the Wanton wife.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
